for the SophiaTX Token Swap

Public key

Private key (Keep the private key in a safe place e.g. printed on paper, etc.)

All keys are generated randomly by a script, which is executed locally in your browser. These keys are not sent anywhere and thus SophiaTX cannot see, recover or reset them. Always keep the private key in a safe place e.g. printed on paper, etc.
